Regulation Name(s): Culture Media, Antimicrobial Susceptibility Test, Excluding Mueller Hinton Agar
Specimen Container(s): Transport media (Amies without charcoal, Cary Blair, LQ Stuart)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bio-Rad VRESelect TM chromogenic culture media for qualitative detection of gastrointestinal colonization by vancomycin-resistant Enterococcus in healthcare settings
Indications for Use Summary: A selective and differential chromogenic medium with 8 μg/mL vancomycin for qualitative detection of gastrointestinal colonization of vancomycin-resistant Enterococcus faecium and Enterococcus faecalis, aiding in prevention and control of VRE in healthcare settings; performed on rectal swabs for screening, not for diagnosis or treatment monitoring.
